body.p: To His Excellency the Governer of Kentucky

Your Petitioner would respectfully ask leave to represent that about the first of July last he had an unfortunate personal difficulty with a man by the name of Wadkins that the said Wadkins provoked the same and upon trial by Jury was fined an equal sum of $5 costs, Your petitioner would further represent that he has a family to support & cannot without depriving them of the comforts nay the bar necessities of life pay the said fine small as it is. & therefore begs yr clemency in remitting the same.

Very Respectfully
Your OBt Humbl Sert
I according to the direction of conscience believe McDaniels fine ought to be remitted

Frankfort Po ct
$5. } assault
E. W. McDaniels
